column1: text

Seeing thick smoke over the riverfront and hearing sirens from every direction; firefighters are blocking off access near River St and asking folks to move back. If you're headed this way, avoid the area. #Breaking #Fire #StaySafe
Finally beat that Elden Ring boss after two hours of pure stubbornness. Pro tip: patience > panic rolling, and a little poison goes a long way. Now I can finally unclench my jaw. #EldenRing #Gaming

Spent the morning chasing a TypeError in Python that turned out to be a sneaky None in a third-party response. Adding explicit checks and some dataclass defaults saved me. Logging is love; logging is life. #Python #DevLife

@nina That latte art looked too pretty to drink! Also, the playlist in that caf√© is straight out of a 2009 Tumblr mood board in the best way. Drop the spot so I can add it to my cowork playlist? ‚òïÔ∏èüé∂

If you're an #IndieDev fighting the visibility boss: devlogs > random promo blasts. Show your process, ask questions, and clip your bugs (they're hilarious). People follow journeys, not splash screens. #GameDev #Marketing

Flash flooding on Riverside Ave right now; water's up to car doors and a couple of sedans are stuck at the underpass. Please don't try to drive through it‚Äîturn around, don't drown. #Flood #WeatherAlert

Upgraded to iOS 18 and it's wild how much smoother Photos search feels. Still can't believe I can find ‚Äúthat photo with the blue umbrella‚Äù in 0.3s. Now if only Mail would stop eating swipe gestures. #iOS #UX

If you're using #VSCode with React, my must-have trio: Error Lens (instant feedback), GitLens (context is everything), and Tailwind IntelliSense (save your brain cells). Bonus: Peacock for multi-project sanity. #WebDev
On repeat: the new synthwave album from that tiny Bandcamp label‚Äîbig analog pads, gentle arps, perfect for deep work. If you liked Timecop1983, this one's in your lane. #NowPlaying #Music

Strong smell of gas around Maple & 8th and the street is taped off; crews are knocking on doors and telling people to back away. If you're nearby, stay upwind and keep clear until they finish checks. #GasLeak #Safety
We brought Wingspan to game night and my dad, who ‚Äúdoesn't like board games,‚Äù is suddenly an apex bird nerd quoting card powers like a rulebook. Birds with tuck mechanics go brrr. #BoardGames
5K before sunrise and the river trail smelled like rain and pine needles. Negative splits felt great, legs not so much. Coffee reward acquired. #Running #MorningMiles
My cat decided the keyboard is the warmest bed and submitted ‚Äú;lkjhhhh‚Äù to my pull request. Honestly, best review comment I've gotten all week. Pic in replies. #CatsOfTwitter #DevLife
Power lines down on Pine Blvd after the storm‚Äîsparking, road closed, and traffic being detoured on Oak. Do not drive over downed lines, even if they look harmless. #StormDamage #PSA
Caught three shorts at the local film fest and I'm still thinking about the sound design on the second one. Tiny theater, huge emotions. Support your neighborhood screens! #FilmTwitter #IndieFilm
Tried a V60 with a natural Ethiopian at 15:1 and it's like blueberries and cocoa had a summer fling. Bloom longer than you think, and don't be afraid of a coarser grind. #Coffee #HomeBarista

Hazmat lights flashing in the warehouse district‚Äîhearing ‚Äúchemical spill‚Äù over a loudspeaker and folks are coughing as they move back. Avoid Dock Rd for now; windows closed if you're nearby. #Hazmat #Emergency
Trimmed our Docker image from 1.2GB to 220MB by multi-stage builds, slimming dependencies, and ditching locale bloat. Deploys are flying. Next up: base image scanning in CI. #DevOps #Docker
@Taro For BG3 Act 2 on Tactician, I swapped Shadowheart to Light domain for Spirit Guardians and it was night and day. Also, don't sleep on Haste + Great Weapon Master synergy. #BaldursGate3

Tried making gochujang-glazed tofu with crisped rice and sesame cucumbers and I'm not kidding, this will be a weeknight staple. Fast, cheap, spicy, crunchy‚Äîwhat more do we want? #HomeCooking #Recipe

Did anyone else feel that quake downtown? Short but sharp‚Äîbooks slid, a couple frames fell, and my dog looked personally offended. Check your gas lines and watch for aftershocks. #Earthquake #Safety

Dear transit agency: real-time bus data is amazing when it's accurate. The 32 ghosted twice, then three showed up together like a clown car. Staggered dispatch would solve so much pain. #Transit #CityLife
Neck pain vanished when I raised my monitor to eye level and finally admitted my chair needed lumbar support. Ergonomics isn't fancy gear; it's angles and breaks. #WFH #Productivity
Siren just went off south of town and the sky has that eerie green tint. Local radio says tornado spotted near County Rd 12‚Äîheading to the hallway now. Stay safe, y'all. #TornadoWarning
Finished ‚ÄúTomorrow, and Tomorrow, and Tomorrow‚Äù and it gutted me in the best way. If you've ever built something with a friend, this one will camp in your head for weeks. #BookRecommendations
Merged my first PR into an open-source project and the maintainer's kindness made my week. Small contributions add up‚Äîdocs, tests, even typo fixes matter. #OpenSource #DevCommunity
Part of the old brick building near Central Station just collapsed‚Äîhuge dust cloud, alarms going off, and responders pushing people back. Please keep clear so EMS can work. #Breaking #Emergency
Spent the evening tweaking pixel art for my metroidvania‚Äîadded parallax on the forest layer and a subtle lantern glow. It's 5% better and my brain says that's 500%. #PixelArt #IndieDev
Golden hour by the river, a 50mm, and patience. Waited for a single cyclist to line up with the bridge arch and it finally happened. Worth the bug bites. #Photography
Reports of a small plane down by the pier; smoke by the marina and Harbor Rd is blocked by patrol cars. If you're in the area, please give first responders space. #Breaking #Aviation
90'+2 and our keeper makes a ridiculous save, then VAR takes five years off my life. Football is therapy and trauma at the same time. #Soccer #MatchDay
@devopsDan Switched back to Mac for the battery life, but I miss tiling WM so bad. Hammerspoon + Rectangle gets me close, and the terminal is still home. #MacOS #Developer
Ash is literally falling in the west hills right now; sky is orange and the smell is intense. Evacuation notice just pinged for Oak Ridge‚Äîpack your go-bag if you're nearby. #Wildfire #StaySafe
New episode of my tiny podcast just dropped: we talked about burnout, inbox zero myths, and why hobbies that don't scale are the best. Link in bio if you want a commute buddy. #Podcast
Planted late-season tomatoes because optimism is free. Basil is thriving, slugs are thriving more, and I'm googling copper tape like it's a heist plan. #Gardening
Going live at 8pm for a chill Stardew Valley stream‚Äîfishing, reorganizing the chaos chest, and trying not to pass out at 1:50 again. Come hang! #Twitch #StardewValley
@archangel I always end up back on #Fedora‚ÄîDNF is fast, GNOME is clean, and Flatpaks keep me sane. Arch is fun until I need to actually ship something. #Linux
Taking the slow train up the coast with a window seat, lo-fi in my ears, and a notebook full of half-ideas. Every town looks like a story I might write. #Travel #TrainLife
Practiced the pitch 10 times today and finally shaved it to 2:45 without losing the ‚Äúwhy.‚Äù Next challenge: stop speed-talking when someone nods. #Startup #FounderLife
Midnight coding thoughts: naming things is still hard, yesterday's hack became today's ‚Äúpattern,‚Äù and the rubber duck knows all my secrets. Ship small, sleep some. #Coding #LateNight
